Name: White Mirror
About the game: White Mirror is a hardcore 2D platformer with a twist, intended for speedrunners. In this double-sided platformer, run, jump and bounce on walls in order to avoid traps and make your way to the end of the level. Players will be able to see an environment and its reflection, which is a perfect inversion of the other one. Platforms, traps and enemies in white only appear on the black background and the other way around, black ones only appear on the white background. However, they exist in both sides. Players must combine both information to see the world how it really is.
